title: Medium Armour Proficiency
content:
Medium Armour Proficiency Wearing Medium Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent the casting of spells.

Medium Armour Proficiency

Wearing Medium Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent the casting of spells.

Medium Armour Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
